This file is designed to test medium-sized data embedding. It should fit comfortably in a 512x512 image.

The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs. How vexingly quick daft zebras jump!

Line breaks, spaces, and punctuation are all part of the test data.
Special characters: !@#$%^&*()_+-=[]{}|;':",./<>?
Numbers: 0123456789

This should be enough text to test basic embedding and extraction functionality.
